description: Discover the best hotels in Istanbul, Turkey. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Istanbul 1920s Shangri-La Heritage Stay on the Bosphorus Strait
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in Istanbul's wonders with a stay in five-star luxury at the lavish Shangri-La Bosphorus, Istanbul housed in a beautifully restored 1920s heritage building, ideally located in the up-and-coming district of Beşiktaş. Luxury comes in the form of chandelier-clad ceilings and Ottoman-inspired glamour, four incredible restaurants and bars, and a heavenly day spa where you can indulge in a traditional hammam experience. Commanding the strait’s waterfront and positioned steps from all that the vibrant district of Beşiktaş has to offer - from restaurants, bars and galleries to the superb Maritime Museum - this is the ultimate base for your Turkey adventures.

hotels.title: Glamorous Istanbul Raffles Opulence with Two Restaurants, Speakeasy-Style Bar & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Where East meets West in spectacular style, this five-star Istanbul icon sits high above the Bosphorus in transcontinental Turkey's chic Zorlu Centre. Expect sleek architecture, curated Turkish art accents, spacious rooms and suites with floor-to-ceiling windows that frame the city like a painting, all enhanced by round-the-clock dedicated butler service. Dining is a grand affair here: savour creative Asian fusion fare at İsokyo, sip on expertly-crafted cocktails from Long Bar and indulge in a literature-inspired speakeasy experience at Writers Bar. After a day of cultural discovery, unwind in the resort's highly acclaimed, expansive spa, boasting traditional hammams, vitality pools and serene treatment rooms.

hotels.title: Modern Istanbul Escape Overlooking the Bosphorus Strait
hotels.description: Signature five-star luxury awaits at the opulent InterContinental Istanbul, an IHG Hotel - the ultimate base to explore the Ottoman capital. Treat yourself to the splendour of an expansive swimming pool, state-of-the-art fitness centre and Spa InterContinental. During your stay, indulge in award-winning dining at Safran Restaurant and Lobby Terrace & Amandine Patisserie, or unwind with a cocktail or tapas at the City Lights Bar and Pool Bar.

hotels.title: Istanbul Five-Star Heritage Mansion Escape on the Banks of the Bosphorus Strait
hotels.description: Fashion and fabulous facilities come together at the five-star Six Senses Kocataş Mansions, a heritage property overlooking the sailboat-studded Bosphorus Strait. Be wined and dined at the hotel's five restaurants, including an onsite patisserie serving up freshly baked pastries, croissants and Turkish coffee. The wellness spa, located across three levels in a 100-year-old stone house, is your go-to for pampering bliss. Indulge in a traditional Turkish hammam, a dip in the infinity pool overlooking the Bosphorus Strait or a range of deeply relaxing massages. When you're ready to venture outside, wander 10 minutes along the banks of the Bosphorus to Sariyer, Istanbul's northernmost district, home to seafood restaurants and the Sadberk Hanim Museum.

hotels.title: Istanbul Old City Heritage Stay near Laleli Mosque
hotels.description: At the heart of a transcontinental city with a storied past, the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Old City, an IHG Hotel, is a luxurious refuge for travellers looking to traverse Turkiye. Visit heritage sites to observe Byzantine architecture or hunt for treasures in the captivating Grand Bazaar. On your return, devour authentic Turkish cuisine at Lale Restaurant or a sweet treat from Cafe Sacez before exploring this magical metropolis by night or retiring to a sumptuous guest room for a well-earned rest.

hotels.title: Lavish Istanbul Retreat with Two Onsite Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Get a taste of authentic Turkey with a stay at the lavish Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Asia, an IHG Hotel, your gateway to the rich experiences of Istanbul. This vibrant metropolis poised at the intersection of two continents has long been a meeting place of cultures, as its incredibly traditions, cuisines and monuments attest. Spend your days exploring this intriguing city before returning to this opulent hotel to escape the heat with a dip in either of the two onsite pools.

hotels.title: Modern Istanbul Escape near Taksim Square with Turkish Hammam
hotels.description: The magic of Istanbul must be seen to be believed - its centuries-old wonders and rich cultural traditions at your fingertips when you stay at the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Harbiye. Just 20 minutes from Taksim Square and two stops on the Metro to the 14th-century Galata Tower, this hotel is perfectly placed for discovering the Turkish capital's history. Experience a Turkish hammam at the onsite spa or indulge in authentic local cuisine at Ege Restaurant and İstisna Restaurant.

hotels.title: Stylish Istanbul Escape with Indoor Swimming Pool
hotels.description: The intrigue of Istanbul beckons visitors from across the globe - discover the city's wonders for yourself with a stay at the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Oryapark, an IHG Hotel. During your stay, take a cooling dip in the indoor swimming pool, keep up with your fitness regime at the fitness centre, or enjoy a pampering treatment at the spa. For dinner, feast on authentic Turkish fare at Oval Restaurant or cap off your evening with a tipple or two at the suave lobby bar.

hotels.title: Istanbul Oceanview Escape with Panoramic Restaurant
hotels.description: Take a break from the everyday and lose yourself in the wonders of Istanbul when you stay at Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Florya, an IHG Hotel. In between daily excursions, stay in and enjoy a refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor swimming pools, treat yourself to some pampering at the spa, and take in sparkling ocean views from the roof terrace with a drink in hand. When hunger strikes, be wined and dined alongside ocean panoramas and live music at Atrox Bar & Lounge.

hotels.title: French-Inspired Istanbul Glamour near Taksim Square with Rooftop Pool, Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Discover the perfect blend of timeless Ottoman charm and classic French elegance at this five-star Sofitel sanctuary, just a stone's throw from vibrant Taksim Square. With convenient access to the metro and the historic tram, Istanbul's cultural treasures - including the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Galata Tower - are all within easy reach. After a day exploring Istanbul's grand bazaars, ancient mosques and bustling streets, refresh with a dip in the rooftop pool or book a rejuvenating hammam session at Sofitel SPA. When hunger strikes, savour Mediterranean-Turkish fare in a chic, glass-walled setting at The Oven Brasserie & Terrace or toast to the day's adventures with a drink at the elegant lobby bar.

hotels.title: Elegant Istanbul Bosphorus Coast Escape 15 Minutes from the Grand Bazaar with Spa & Rooftop Dining
hotels.description: Ideally located right by iconic Bosphorus Bridge, this elegant hotel will plunge you into sophisticated modernism, with Istanbul's inspiring architecture, culture, history and cuisine right on your doorstep - the bustling Grand Bazaar and striking Hagia Sofia are just a 15-minute drive away. Take in sweeping views of the city from the rooftop restaurant, or relax and unwind at the hotel's Sanitas Spa before exploring all the city has to offer.

hotels.title: Five-Star Kempinski Istanbul Palace Stay with Breathtaking Bosphorus Strait Views
hotels.description: Enjoy a unique stay in the only Ottoman Imperial palace and hotel on the Bosphorus, the Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul. This five-star escape is perched on the banks of the Bosphorus Strait and offers spellbinding ocean views from almost every vantage. Fine dining is a celebrated affair at the hotel's seven restaurants and bars: sip handcrafted cocktails in Le Fumoir, feast on Italian classics in Bellini Pasta & More and brunch in the 17th-century gardens at Lalefan Restaurant. Between gastronomic delights, experience an authentic Turkish bathing experience in the palatial Sanitas Spa and take a dip in the mirror-like infinity pool boasting views across the Bosphorus.
